originalText: dc_tchortistGuard
Start Element
guard
I knew it! Get out of here before I put a bullet through your skull!

::One of the rassophores lifts his weapon at the very first sight of your indistinguishable contour, shouting for the rest of the guards.::

The Faceless - they are attacking again! Cull! Fire! FIRE!
That's good enough! ::As you come to a full stop, all eyes fall on you in an act of great scrutiny.::
context.npc_tch_stavros_expelled
context.npc_dc_tchortistGuard_met

::Before he gets the chance to unleash a hail of bullets he seems so keen on unleashing, one of the other, significantly taller rassophore guards stops him.::

Hold it, brother - that could be one of our own!
context.npc_dc_tchortistGuard_met
context.npc_dc_tchortistGuard_comeCloser
$(#He/She) matches the description. Well, that is a relief! You may enter Cytosine Outpost, $(#brother/sister). Tchort is Evolution.
Well, $(#he/she) looks like one of us... Tchort is evolution, $(#brother/sister).
Where is your robe, $(#brother/sister)?
context.loc_dc_tchortistsEscaped
$(#Brother/Sister).
I would've shot you, you know.
I'm watching you, $(#brother/sister).

::The edgy rassophore slowly lowers his weapon, while his comrade turns to you.::

You there, identify yourself!
I would like to talk with whoever is in charge here.

::[Persuade]:: Only an idiot would wear a Tchortist robe in Faceless infested caves; I don't want to get culled on sight. Besides, their attack on the Institute was sudden and I didn't have the time to grab my robe.
I am one of you, brothers. I come from the Institute. Didn't the rassophores I helped tell you about me?
I am a Tchortist, brothers, just like you. I come from the Institute.
You deluded Tchortists should have taken your shots when you had the chance. Now YOU. WILL. DIE! ::Attack!::
His Excellency, Harmost Stavros can be found in his office; go straight then left to get to it. I'm sure he'd want to know what is going on over at the Institute.

You will be taken care of, $(#brother/sister), but first talk with His Excellency, Harmost Stavros; go straight then left to get to his office. I'm sure he'd want to know what is going on over at the Institute.
tchnob
::The edgy rassophore shouts.:: $(#He/She) doesn't know the greeting! CULL the Faceless infiltrator! CULL!
::The edgy rassophore shouts.:: Did you hear that? $(#He/She) repeated it! $(#He/She) doesn't know the greeting! CULL the Faceless infiltrator! CULL!
Good! Now, if you ca--
Nine? Wha--
That makes sense... Tchort is evolution, $(#brother/sister).
And only a Faceless infiltrator would be able to survive in Deep Caverns! I'm not buying any of this! Cull the liar! CULL!

::The edgy rassophore raises his weapon.::

I knew it! Faceless infiltrator! CULL $(#HIM/HER)!

::The two of them look at each other.:: 

Yes, but there was only one rassophore. The rest didn't make it. Come closer - but slowly. We can't take any chances.

::The two of them look at each other.:: 

Yes, they have made it safely. Come closer - but slowly. We can't take any chances.

::The two of them look at each other.:: 

Come closer, but do so slowly.
Then you are in the wrong place, whoever you are. We can't help you. Turn away and leave, or we will open fire.

::The edgy rassophore raises his weapon.::

What if this is a diversion? What if the Faceless are watching us RIGHT NOW!?
Tchort guide you, $(#brother/sister).
::Fight!::
I'm not convinced! The inbreds surely know our greetings, brother! Let's ask $(#him/her) something that ONLY a Tchortist would know, something that will surely prove $(#he/she) is one of us!
::Approach the barricade.::
You don't understand - I am a Tchortist, and I come from the Institute.

::One moment of hesitation from the taller rassophore was enough for the edgy one to lose his calm and open fire. Luckily, all bullets harmlessly fly around you, but it becomes clear that talking is no longer an option.::
Tchort guide you too.
See ya.

::The taller rassophore ponders for a moment before asking you the question.:: What was the last name of the Biocorp Armed Forces captain who escorted Eidein to Deep Caverns during their expedition? Only those who have read the Original Report can possibly know the answer.
Dc_PlayerApproachesTchortists
We can't help you. Now - I repeat - leave or we *will* open fire.
English
Sagan.
English
::[Intelligence]:: Sagan.
See, brother!? $(#He/She) doesn't know - $(#he/she) never read the Original Report! CULL THE FACELESS INFILTRATOR!
That is correct; I think that is all the proof we need! You can enter Cytosine Outpost, $(#brother/sister).
context.interface_tch_originalReport_knowSagan
context.interface_tch_originalReport_knowSagan
context.interface_tch_originalReport_knowSagan
$(#Brother/Sister), I suggest you go and speak with His Excellency, Harmost Stavros; go straight then left to get to his office. I'm sure he'd want to know what is going on over at the Institute.
